thread.title: Metro Detroit shows on sale Oct. 1-7
thread.title_full: Metro Detroit shows on sale Oct. 1-7

author: freep.com
title: Metro Detroit shows on sale Oct. 1-7
text:
MORE Most tickets available at www .ticketmaster .com, www.livenation.com, www .aeglive .com or www .ticketweb .com . Additional charges may apply.
On sale Thursday, Oct.1
Omi: 10 p.m. Nov. 25, MotorCity Casino, $25.
On sale Friday, Oct. 2
Pop Evil: 7 p.m. Nov. 21, Royal Oak Music Theatre, $15 and up.
The Comedy Get Down with Cedric the Entertainer, Eddie Griffin, D.L. Hughley, George Lopez and Charlie Murphy: 8 p.m. Nov. 28, Joe Louis Arena, $49.75-$250.
“The Nutcracker”: 7 p.m. Dec. 5, Michigan Theater, $25-$35.
Siegel-Schwall Band: 8 p.m. Dec. 18, The Magic Bag, $25.
“Men Are From Mars Women Are From Venus”: 4 p.m. Jan. 23, City Theatre, $54.
On sale Saturday, Oct. 3
Harlem Globetrotters: 2 p.m. Jan. 2, Palace of Auburn Hills, $13.50-$128.50.
On sale Monday, Oct. 5
Herman’s Hermits: 7:30 p.m. June 16, Meadow Brook Theatre, $85-$125.
— Compiled by Brendel Hightower
